00068 typedef enum
00069 {
00070         opj_signed_sentinel             = -1, /* do not use in code */
00071         opj_stream_e_output             = 0x1,
00072         opj_stream_e_input              = 0x2,
00073         opj_stream_e_end                = 0x4,
00074         opj_stream_e_error              = 0x8
00075 }

00204 /***
00205  * Write some bytes to the given data buffer, this function is used in Big Endian cpus.

00208  */
